title: [CLIENT] Autofill for teambuilder doesn't properly select skin
body: I had finished a game as Woad Ashe in teambuilder, than went back to the main screen, and then went back to teambuilder. It had autofilled for Ashe Marksman Bottom, but when I got into game, I had no skin on. When I finished that game, and hit 'play again', and checked what skin I had on, it was Woad Ashe again (I didn't actually go into game).

replies.body: Same here with Twitch Pickpocket skin
